Title: Overseas Expert Uses 'First Comment' Strategy to Grow Instagram Followers from 0 to 40K in Four Months - You Can Do It Too!
Content: Growing followers on social media isn't easy, but effective strategies can improve efficiency. First, find influencers with similar positioning and actively reply to their posts. Choose comments that resonate or provide value, which can attract people to click on your profile and follow you. Additionally, use the platform's notification feature to like and comment on posts early, increasing your interaction rate and chances of being recommended. Finally, ensure your profile content matches your comment strategy, offering valuable and engaging content to retain new followers.
